body.name: LEGO Creator 3 in 1 Flowers in Watering Can Building Toy, Transforms from Watering Can to Rain Boot to 2 Birds, Fun Animal Toy for Kids, Gift for Valentine's Day, Nature Toy for Girls and Boys, 31149
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 43 mins
features: 3 colorful flower toys in 1 box for kids – The LEGO Creator 3 in 1 Flowers in Watering Can building set lets girls and boys ages 8+ build and rebuild 3 detailed models with the same set of bricks
Nature toy with endless play options – Kids can play out stories with a watering can toy filled with 3 flowers and 3 butterflies, a yellow boot filled with 3 flowers, or 2 toy birds on a perch
3 in 1 toy with interactive features – Includes flowers with movable petals and butterfly toys on transparent sticks that give the impression they are flying for added playtime fun
Display models inspired by nature – This and other LEGO Creator sets can be displayed to add color to any room and for young creators and their friends and family to enjoy
Creative birthday gift for kids ages 8 and up – This 3 in 1 toy kids makes a fun birthday or holiday gift idea for girls and boys who love nature, animals and building with LEGO bricks
More 3 in 1 fun – Look out for other LEGO Creator 3 in 1 sets (sold separately) with themes including animals, space and vehicles
LEGO Creator toys – Every 3 in 1 set lets kids choose between 3 different colorful models to build, inspired by some of their biggest passions
body.description: Build, rebuild, play with and display 3 colorful models inspired by nature with this LEGO Creator 3 in 1 Flowers in Watering Can (31149) set. It features a brick-built yellow watering can toy with a handle and spout. It’s filled with 3 flower toys with movable petals and 3 butterfly toys on transparent sticks that give the impression they are flying. This set is a great flower and animal toy for kids. Girls and boys ages 8 and up can rebuild this nature toy into a yellow rain boot filled with 3 flowers with movable petals, or 2 cute yellow toy birds on a flower-covered perch. Each model can be displayed proudly in their room. LEGO Creator 3 in 1 toys make great creative gifts with 3 different model choices for kids to choose from in every set. From cool vehicles and amazing animals to detailed city scenes, there’s a LEGO Creator set for everyone. Contains 420 pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 colorful nature toys in 1 box Bring nature inside with this LEGO Creator 3in1 watering can toy set, which rebuilds into a rain boot or 2 birds on a perch.
A fun build to brighten up any room Kids aged 8+ can have an enjoyable building experience before choosing where to display one of the 3 colorful models.

LEGO Creator Flowers in Watering Can Watering can toy Includes flowers with movable petals and 3 butterflies. Rain boot with flowers Yellow boot also features 3 flowers with movable petals. 2 birds on a floral perch Kids can enjoy creative play with 2 adorable birds.
Discover more 3in1 toy playsets Kids can enjoy even more fun with other LEGO Creator 3in1 building sets (sold separately).
Enter a digital world of building Little builders can zoom in, rotate sets in 3D and track their progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Lego set!
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and satisfying to build. It can also be used as decor around the house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Fun Build
reviews.reviewText: The watering can with flowers and butterflies is quite adorable. It was a fun build on a chilly winter day. I like the fact that it is a 3 in 1 and the other two builds also look interesting, which isn’t always the case. Watch for the ‘eyes’ inside the watering can. I definitely think this set was worth the $30.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful new flower set
reviews.reviewText: Colors are amazing and I especially love that it comes with containers, one of my favorite Lego sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little set!
reviews.reviewText: This set is absolutely beautiful and fun to build. What I love about this set is that you can build three different models (not all at once). I can take it apart and rebuild it into something different, I think that's neat. Worth the money.
